name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria
name_original: The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Turbine. It was originally released in 2008. Codemasters published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria on PC.
It was scored by Chance Thomas.
